alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Noxubee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 3:51PM CST until January 01 at 4:15PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN NOXUBEE AND NORTH CENTRAL KEMPER COUNTIES... At 351 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Gholson, or 8 miles east of Preston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Noxubee and north central Kemper Counties, including the following locations... Shuqualak. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
